member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.AuthenticationSettings
member.summary: Authentication settings.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.AuthenticationSettings.AccessToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the access token used for accessing Label Cloud. If not specified then user's token is used (user must be signed in and SDK included with NiceLabel installation must be used).

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.ControlCenterProperties
member.summary: All Control Center related properties.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ControlCenterProperties.ControlCenterUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the ControlCenter Url. Needed to access the document storage information.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ControlCenterProperties.EngineCacheLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets the engine cache location. Database file needed for control center logging location.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ControlCenterProperties.IsPrintLoggingEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether print logging is enabled.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.ControlCenterProperties.IsPrintLoggingCompleted
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether logging to control center has been completed (All print events ware sent to the server.).

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.ControlCenterProperties.Login(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logins on the Control Center with specified username and password combination if application authentication is enabled.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.DocumentStorage.ControlCenterUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the control center URL. Note - this is public property to be used internally by SDK, but not exposed in interface. It is expected for the ControlCenterUrl to be set through PrintEngine.ControlCenterUrl property.

member.summary: Retrieves the documents from storage server.
member.param: If set to true directories will also be returned.

member.summary: Retrieves the document from storage server.

member.summary: Retrieves revisioning configuration of document storage server.
member.returns: True if document storage supports revisioning, false otherwise.

member.summary: Checks out document from storage server.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.DocumentStorage.CheckInDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks in document to storage server.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.DocumentStorage.DiscardDocumentCheckOut(System.String)
member.summary: Discards the check out from storage server.
member.param: The file for which to discard check out.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.DetailedPrintEngineException
member.summary: Exception class used by the SDK. Derived from the SDK base exception class SDKException, and it initialized detailed message and debug messages from core exception information. If Diagnostics service is initialized, it will also trace the exceptions in log.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.DetailedPrintEngineException.#ctor(NiceLabel.SDK.SDKErrorCode,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The exception that caused the problem.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.DetailedPrintEngineException.#ctor(NiceLabel.SDK.SDKErrorCode,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.DetailedSDKException
member.summary: Exception class used by the SDK. Derived from the SDK base exception class SDKException, and it initialized detailed message and debug messages from core exception information. If Diagnostics service is initialized, it will also trace the exceptions in log.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.DetailedSDKException.#ctor(NiceLabel.SDK.SDKErrorCode,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The exception that caused the problem.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.DetailedSDKException.#ctor(NiceLabel.SDK.SDKErrorCode,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.SDKExceptionHelper
member.summary: Static class for formatting exception details (error message, detailed message).

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.SDKExceptionHelper.InitializeMessages(NiceLabel.SDK.SDKException,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes message properties of target exception based on the inner exception passed as parameters.
member.param: The target exception which message properties will be set.
The inner exception which is used to retrieve the detailed information.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.SDKExceptionHelper.GetDetailedErrorCode(System.Exception)
member.summary: Gets the detailed error code from the exception.
member.returns: ErrorCode string in case the exception is a CoreException. Otherwise formatted message that includes all messages from the InnerExceptions.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.SDKExceptionHelper.GetDetailedMessage(System.Exception)
member.summary: Gets the detailed error message from the exception.
member.returns: Formatted message of all detailed messages from InnerExceptions.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.Licensing.Certificate
member.summary: Implements checking of license certificate file.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Licensing.Certificate.Check
member.summary: Checks for the existence and validity of license certificate file, single user license or ControlCenter licensing.
member.exception: No valid license found. or License expired. or No valid ethernet adapters found. Single user license can not be verified due to non-existing internet connection. (for single user licensing). or Single user license can not be verified. (for single user licensing).

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Licensing.Certificate.IsRunningEpm
member.summary: Determines whether SDK is running from Control Center.
member.remarks: Should only be called in print engine initialize and cached.
member.returns: True if SDK is part of Control Center; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Encrypts the specified data using password provided.
member.param: Key passed is in hexadecimal or not.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Licensing.RC4.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Decrypts the specified data.
member.param: Key to decrypt with (can be binary of hex).
Key passed is in hexadecimal or not.

member.summary: Converts binary data to Hexadecimal encoded data.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.SetVariableValuesXml(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the values to multiple variables using an XML data format.
member.param: XML document containing names and values for variables in each node.
When true, if variable does not exist in the label it is ignored. Otherwise an exception will be thrown.
member.exception: Variable values cannot be set.
member.remarks: Characters that are XML specific cannot be used in the values and should be encoded.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.SetVariableValues(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the values to multiple variables.
member.param: String containing name-value pairs for variables in each line.
When true, if variable does not exist in the label it is ignored. Otherwise an exception will be thrown.
member.exception: Variable values cannot be set.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.GetLabelPreview(NiceLabel.SDK.ILabelPreviewSettings)
member.summary: Gets the preview of the label. Resulting preview depends on the provided setting provided by the input IPreviewFormat.
member.returns: Preview object containing preview image path or the image byte array.
member.exception: No label design is loaded, label design must be loaded before this call is made. or Cannot generate preview.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.Print(System.Int32)
member.summary: Print the requested number of labels.
member.param: Number of labels to be printed.
member.exception: Error occurred during printing.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.PrintAll
member.summary: Prints labels for all available data. This call is used when the label retrieves the data from the database, and labels for all retrieved records should be printed.
member.returns: The returned print request can be used to check for status of the print request and to later follow its spooling status.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.PrintAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Print the requested number of labels.
member.param: Number of labels to be printed.
member.exception: Error occurred during printing.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.PrintAllAsync
member.summary: Asynchronously prints labels for all available data. This call is used when the label retrieves the data from the database, and labels for all retrieved records should be printed.
member.returns: The returned print request is used to monitor the print process progress and the spooling status of the request.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.StartSessionPrint
member.summary: Start the session printing.
member.returns: The print request of started session print.
member.exception: Error occurred during printing.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.SessionPrint(System.Int32,NiceLabel.SDK.ISessionPrintRequest)
member.summary: Print the requested number of labels for the specified session print.
member.param: The quantity of labels to be printed.
member.exception: Error occurred during printing.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.EndSessionPrint(NiceLabel.SDK.ISessionPrintRequest)
member.summary: End the session printing.
member.exception: Error occurred during printing.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.PrintToGraphics(NiceLabel.SDK.IPrintToGraphicsSettings)
member.summary: Prints the requested number of labels to graphics.
member.exception: Error occurred during printing.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.CreateXMLLabelInformation
member.summary: Stores information of the label current label to an XML document.
member.returns: The xml document containing the information.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.Clone
member.summary: Returns cloned instance of the current ILabel. Every Cloned instance must be released with call to Dispose.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.SaveAs(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Saves label using a specified file name.
File extension options are:
*.nlbl - file is saved as label file.
*.nsln - file is saved as solution file.
member.param: If set to true, the file is overwritten.
member.remarks:
You can load *.lbl files and save them using *.nlbl or *.nsln formats.
You can convert label format (*.nlbl) to solution format (*.nsln).

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.StoreToPrinter(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Stores the label to the printer.
member.param: Label name to be used on printer. If this parameter is not specified than the default label name is used.
Store variant defines the printer memory location for label templates. If this parameter is not specified than the store variant defined in the label is used.
member.exception: Error occurred while storing label to printer.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.CreateLabelVariant(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a review-ready variant of this label.
member.param: The name of the label variant file that is going to be ready for review.
List of data sources for which the value will be provided at the actual print time. If a data source is listed in this field, its value is not locked and can be provided at print time.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.GetBoundingRectangle(EuroPlus.NiceLabel.Interfaces.IDocumentItem)
member.summary: Gets the label object bounding rectangle. Used internally in SDK, not exposed in the interface.
member.returns: The bounding rectangle of the object.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.InvalidateLabelPreview
member.summary: Invalidates label preview needs to be called by property setters whenever property changes bounding rectangle of any object.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases unmanaged and - optionally - managed resources.
member.param: True to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.InternalPrint(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Prints the label using fixed quantity or unlimited quantity.
member.param: If set to true all labels are printed.
member.exception: Error occurred during printing.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.InternalPrintAsync(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Asynchronously prints the label using fixed quantity or unlimited quantity.
member.param: If set to true all labels are printed.
member.exception: Error occurred during printing.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.RefreshRevision
member.summary: Gets the latest revision for the current label.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Label.GetVariables
member.summary: Gets the variables, in case of label files variables are defined on format level and in case of solution files on solution level.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintServiceSettings
member.summary: All print service related settings.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintServiceSettings.MaxConcurrentPrintProcesses
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent print processes.
member.remarks: If the value is set to 0 then the number of concurrent print processes depends on the number of virtual processors. It will be set to the number of virtual processors divided by 2 (or 1 if computer has only 1 processor).

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintServiceSettings.MaxConcurrentSessionPrintProcesses
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent session print processes.
member.remarks: If the value is set to 0 then the number of concurrent session print processes depends on the number of virtual processors. It will be set to the number of virtual processors divided by 2 (or 1 if computer has only 1 processor).

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintServiceSettings.PageBackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the page background.
member.value: The color of the page background.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintServiceSettings.PaintPageBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether page background should be painted. If set to false label preview will use up the entire surface.
member.value: True if page background should be painted, otherwise false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintServiceSettings.Enable32BitProxy
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether 32-bit proxy process will start and process VBScript and 32-bit database operations. 32-bit proxy process is started only when host application runs in 64-bit mode. Setting must be enabled before calling PrintEngine Initialize.
member.value: True if 32-bit proxy process should be enabled; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Creates a session print request.
member.param: The quantity for the session print.

member.summary: Ends the session print request.

member.summary: Event that is fired when spool job status changes.

member.summary: Event that is fired when the quantity is changed.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintRequest.SpoolJobStatus

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the printer.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the label.

member.summary: Gets or sets the requested quantity.

member.summary: Gets or sets the spool job id.

member.summary: Gets or sets the print exception if an error occurs during print.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintRequest.PrintProcessInitializer
member.summary: Gets or sets the print process initializer.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintRequest.Cancel
member.summary: Cancels the print request.

member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.summary: Initializes the specified engine print request.

member.summary: Releases unmanaged and - optionally - managed resources.
member.param: True to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintRequest.GetSpoolJobStatus(EuroPlus.WindowsApi.JobStatus)
member.summary: Gets the spool job status from flags.
member.remarks: Statuses have priorities. If job status contains error and printing flags, we return only error status.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings
member.summary: Implementation of IPrinterSettings interface. The object contains parameters used to create the print job.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.#ctor(EuroPlus.NiceLabel.Interfaces.IFormat)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.PrinterName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the printer to be used for printing. If not explicitly set, the value returned is the printer saved with the label.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.SkipLabels
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of labels to be skipped on the first printing page.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.IdenticalCopies
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of identical label copies. When set to more than one (default value), each label in the print job is multiplied by the copy count. For example, if the print job would include labels 1, 2 and 3, and the IdenticalCopies is set to 3, the resulting print job will include labels 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2, 3, 3, 3.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.LabelSets
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of label sets. When set to more than one, the complete print job is multiplied. For example, if the print job would include labels 1, 2 and 3, and the LabelSets is set to 3, the resulting print job will include labels 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3, 1, 2, 3.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.OutputFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the output file.
member.value: The name of the output file.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.MonitorSpoolJobStatus
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether spool job status is monitored in print request.
member.remarks: If this setting is enabled, print request must be disposed after completion to avoid memory leaks.
member.value: True if spool job status is monitored; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.JobName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the spooler job.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.PrintToPdf
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether print output is saved to PDF document. PDF document path must be specified in property.
member.value: True if print output must be saved to PDF document; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.AppendToOutputFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the print job is appended to the output file.
member.value: True if print job needs to be appended to the output file; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.OffsetX
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset X.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.OffsetY
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset Y.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.DevModeBuffer
member.summary: Gets or sets the dev mode.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.Reset
member.summary: Resets the print parameters to their default values.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.SetParameter(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to set advanced print parameters before printing. Supported parameters are: - PaperBin - PrintDarkness - PrintSpeed - HorizontalOffset - VerticalOffset - PrintSettings (as base64 encoded printer DEVMODE).

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintSettings.GetRootPath
member.summary: Gets the root path.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintToGraphicsResult
member.summary: When is called, the return value is an instance of this class.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintToGraphicsResult.FrontSides
member.summary: Gets or sets the front side results.
member.remarks: Based on the print to graphics settings, result can be either a filename or the graphics itself. See for more information.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintToGraphicsResult.BackSides
member.summary: Gets or sets the back side results.
member.remarks: Based on the print to graphics settings, result can be either a filename or the graphics itself. See for more information.

member.summary: Gets the name of the field.

member.summary: Overloads the value of the field to the provided value.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject
member.summary: Implements the ILabelObject interface.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.#ctor(NiceLabel.SDK.ILabel,EuroPlus.NiceLabel.Interfaces.IDocumentItem)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.Name
member.summary: Gets the label object name.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.Position
member.summary: Gets the position of the object.
member.value: The position of the object's anchoring point in 1/100 of a millimeter.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.Size
member.summary: Gets the size of the object.
member.value: The size of the object. If the size is determined by other object's properties (for example Font, FontHeight and Content for text fields), returned value will be (0, 0).

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the object rotation. If the rotation is determined by other object's properties (for example starting and ending point for line), exception will be thrown if a value is assigned.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.IsOnBackSide
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this object is on back side of the label.
member.value: True if this object is on back side; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.AnchoringPoint
member.summary: Gets the anchoring point of the object.
member.value: The anchoring point: 0 - LeftTop 1 - CenterTop 2 - RightTop 3 - LeftMiddle 4 - CenterMiddle 5 - RightMiddle 6 - LeftBottom 7 - CenterBottom 8 - RightBottom.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.Color
member.summary: Gets or sets the color.
member.value: The color of the label object.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.IsVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the object is visible.
member.value: True if the object is visible; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.LabelDocumentItem
member.summary: Gets the label object.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.Label
member.summary: Gets the label.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the label object to new position.
member.param: The horizontal position of the object in 0.001mm units.
The vertical position of the object in 0.001mm units.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.MoveBy(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the label object by specified distance.
member.param: The horizontal distance from current position of the object in 0.001mm units.
The vertical distance from current position of the object in 0.001mm units.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.Resize(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Resizes the label object to the provided size. When the object size is specified by other attributes (like Font, FontHeight and Content for text object), exception will be thrown.
member.param: The new width of the object.
The new height of the object.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.GetBoundingRectangle
member.summary: Gets the bounding rectangle of the object. This method requires rendering of the label and therefore more processing time.
member.returns: The rectangle of the label object's boundaries (position and size) in 0.001mm units.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.GetDocumentItemRuntime(EuroPlus.NiceLabel.Interfaces.IDocumentItem)
member.summary: Gets the document item runtime. If it does not exist yet, the format runtime is created and runtime is looked up again and returned.
member.returns: The runtime of the label object.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.LabelObject.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases unmanaged and - optionally - managed resources.
member.param: True to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable
member.summary: Implements the IVariable interface.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.#ctor(EuroPlus.NiceLabel.Interfaces.ISolutionRuntime,EuroPlus.NiceLabel.Interfaces.IVariable)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.Name
member.summary: Gets the variable name.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.Description
member.summary: Gets the variable description.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.CurrentValue
member.summary: Gets the current value of the variable. If variable's value has not been set yet, the returned value will be variable's default value.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.CurrentInputValue
member.summary: Gets the current input value for the variable. If variable's value has not been set yet, the returned value will be variable's default input value.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.IncrementType
member.summary: Gets or sets the increment type of the variable. Possible values are: 0 - none 1 - Increment 2 - Decrement.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.PromptText
member.summary: Gets the prompt text of the variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.PromptOrder
member.summary: Gets the prompt order of the variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.IncrementStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the increment step. When incrementing is defined, the value defines the difference between two increments.
member.exception: The counter properties can not be assigned to a variable, because it is not a counter.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.IncrementCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of increment count. When incrementing is defined, the value defines after how many labels the value will be changed.
member.exception: The counter properties can not be assigned to a variable, because it is not a counter.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.Format
member.summary:
Gets or sets the format of the variable. Possible values are: 0 - All 1 - Numeric 2 - Alphanumeric 3 - Letters 4 - Seven bit 5 - Hexadecimal 6 - Other
Only values 0 - 5 can be set to the variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.IsUsed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether variable is used in the label.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.Length
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of the variable. If the value is 0, the variable's length is not limited.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.IsValueRequired
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether variable value is required.
member.value: True if value is required for the variable; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.IsFixedLength
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether variable value must have fixed length.
member.value: True if value must have fixed length; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.IsPrompted
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this variable is prompted. Prompted variable displays a message to the user and lets him enter a value before printing.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.DefaultValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the default value of the variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.VariableType
member.summary: Gets the type of the prompt variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.IsPickListEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether variable has pick list enabled. If pick list is enabled than holds a list of selectable input values for this variable. No other values can be used with this variable if a pick list is defined.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.PickListValues
member.summary: Gets a list of selectable input values for this variable. No other values can be used with this variable if a pick list is defined.
member.value: If is True than the returned value is a list of selectable input values otherwise null is returned.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.MinimumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum valid value of the variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.HasMinimumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the variable is using minimum value.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.MaximumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum valid value of the variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.HasMaximumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the variable is using maximum value.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.HasRolloverOnMinimumMaximumValue
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the variable counter is rolling over using minimum and maximum value.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.Prefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix of the variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.Suffix
member.summary: Gets or sets the suffix of the variable.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.IsDynamicValue
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the dynamic value of this variable is enabled or not.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.InputFormat
member.summary: Gets the value input format for date/time variables.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.OutputFormat
member.summary: Gets the value output format for date/time variables.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.SetValue(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the new value to the variable.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Variable.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases unmanaged and - optionally - managed resources.
member.param: True to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.Printer.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the printer.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.Printer.SendDataToPrinter(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends the data to printer by creating a new print job and sending it to the spooler.
member.param: The data for the print job.

member.name: T:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine
member.summary: Main print engine class for accessing all SDK functionality. An instance of PrintEngine class can not be created by the caller. At all times, only one instance of this class will exist in memory, and caller can access it through the property.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.#ctor
member.summary: Prevents a default instance of the class from being created.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.Instance
member.summary: Gets the instance of the SDK. Always only a single instance of SDK class can be created, and reference to it can be obtained through the Instance static property.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.Initialized
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this is initialized.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.OverrideFields
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to override all dataset fields to be of type string.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.ControlCenterProperties
member.summary: Gets the control center properties.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.AuthenticationSettings
member.summary: Gets the authentication settings.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.PrintServiceSettings
member.summary: Gets the print service settings.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.TraceFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the trace file. If tracing is required, the property needs to be set prior to calling Initialize method.
member.value: The trace file. When set, SDK activities will be traced to the file.
member.remarks: If a file SDK.NET.trace is found next to the SDK.NET.dll assembly, trace is enabled and that file is set as TraceFile property.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.Printers
member.summary: Gets the list of all printers.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.LocalSdkFolder
member.summary: Gets the local SDK folder.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.IsPartOfPowerFormsSuite
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether SDK is part of Power Forms Suite.
member.value: True if SDK is part of Power Forms Suite; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.IsPartOfControlCenter
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether SDK is part of Control Center.
member.value: True if SDK is part of Control Center; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.IsCloudPrintingService
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether SDK is used in cloud printing service.
member.value: True if SDK is used in cloud printing service; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.IsPartOfLabelConverter
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether SDK is part of Label Converter.
member.value: True if SDK is part of Label Converter; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.ExternalFileServiceSettings
member.summary: Gets the external file service settings.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes the instance of the class.
member.remarks: Before any other call, the application needs to call method of the PrintEngine.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.Shutdown
member.summary: Shutdowns this instance of the class.
member.remarks: When application is closing, it needs to call the Shutdown method. This method will make sure to complete all unfinished tasks and free all the resources.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.OpenLabel(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Opens the label from a stream and returns the interface to access the object.
member.param: Used by the engine when items (picture, text database, etc.) are located on one of the relative predefined paths.
member.remarks: If the label can not be opened or an error occurs while opening, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.OpenLabel(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Opens the label from a stream and returns the interface to access the object.
member.param: Used by the engine when items (picture, text database, etc.) are located on one of the relative predefined paths.
member.remarks: If the label can not be opened or an error occurs while opening, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.OpenLabel(System.String)
member.summary: Opens the label from the file and returns the interface to access the object.
member.remarks: If the label can not be opened or an error occurs while opening, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.OpenSolution(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Opens the solution from a stream and returns the interface to access the object.
member.param: The engine will use the provided path to locate the external items referenced in a solution (pictures, text databases, etc.) The path can be absolute or relative. When using relative path, the start folder is the folder with solution file. Always include the trailing backslash character (when using drives) or trailing forward slash (when using http location in the Document Storage).
member.remarks: If the solution can not be opened or an error occurs while opening, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.OpenSolution(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Opens the solution from a stream and returns the interface to access the object.
member.param: The engine will use the provided path to locate the external items referenced in a solution (pictures, text databases, etc.) The path can be absolute or relative. When using relative path, the start folder is the folder with solution file. Always include the trailing backslash character (when using drives) or trailing forward slash (when using http location in the Document Storage).
member.remarks: If the solution can not be opened or an error occurs while opening, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.OpenSolution(System.String)
member.summary: Opens the solution from the file and returns the interface to access the object.
member.remarks: If the solution can not be opened or an error occurs while opening, an exception will be thrown.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.GetDocumentStorage
member.summary: Method returns an instance of DocumentStorage class, which can be used to communicate with DocumentStorage.
member.returns: A new instance of object implementing IDocumentStorage interface.

member.summary: Sets the setting value. For SDK internal use only.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.UpdateDocumentStorageControlCenterUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Updates the document storage control center URL. When ControlCenterProperties are updated, the print engine takes care to update Url wherever required.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.CheckLicense
member.summary: Checks the license.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.CheckInitialized
member.summary: Checks and throws an exception if SDK is not initialized yet.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.GetLocalSdkFolder
member.summary: Gets the local SDK folder.
member.returns: The path to the SDK folder.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.OemServiceInitialize
member.summary: Initializes the oem service.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.PrintEngine.CurrentDomain_AssemblyResolve(System.Object,System.ResolveEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the AssemblyResolve event of the CurrentDomain control.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.
member.remarks: Assemblies in x86 and x64 folders do not get loaded without this.

member.name: M:NiceLabel.SDK.SoftwareExpiration.CheckIfSoftwareExpired
member.summary: Checks if the software has expired.
member.exception: Exception is thrown if software is expired.
